column1: I applaud @realDonaldTrump for taking action to help those who need it most.  People  are struggling to make ends meet. Speaker Pelosi knows this but she is too concerned with making outrageous demands for a non-COVID related wishlist of items to come to the table seriously.
Starting TODAY eligible farmers and ranchers can begin submitting applications for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program (CFAP) administered by @USDA    https://t.co/AY39aXLONm
Starting on Tuesday May 26th eligible #farmers and #ranchers can begin submitting applications for the Coronavirus Food Assistance Program (CFAP) administered by @USDA.  https://t.co/h2eoPbbxtY

It appears you were ill-informed Bob. Sharing this manipulated video is beneath you & we expect more from journalists. For the record my full quote said “Covid-19 isn’t a Republican problem or a Democrat problem it’s an American problem.”  #StrongerTogetherEvenWhenApart https://t.co/pAPwbeQzSB

President @realDonaldTrump and @SecBernhardt  are working to reopen our National Parks in a safe and responsible way. I applaud this effort access to public land is a wise way to social distance.  https://t.co/foylxy1tpE
The @INL is getting involved to help mitigate the impacts of #COVID19 https://t.co/pLvLdojOvY

On this #GoodFriday people of all different beliefs and from all parts of the world are joining together in fasting and prayer to seek relief from the COVID-19 pandemic. I welcome this outpouring of faith and hope as we enter into #EasterWeekend https://t.co/KNSRVBZDe3

As my staff and I are teleworking to help limit the spread of #Covid_19 more than even it’s important we hear your questions and concerns via my website https://t.co/0b8vJQcy3g https://t.co/5LplgSZoqj

The #coronavirus is unlike anything we’ve dealt with which is why @TomColeOK04 and I asked the Coronavirus Task Force to explore innovative technologies that show promise in creating vaccines and treatments for COVID-19.    Read the full letter below   https://t.co/S4JjbjoU6g

This legislation is a necessary step towards stabilizing our economy providing resources for health providers on the front lines and furthers access to patients who have been stricken by #COVID19 https://t.co/a6LwloClR6

The spread of #COVIDー19 isn't a Republican problem or a Democrat problem it's an American problem.  Stay Calm Stay Informed and Stay Home!  We're in this together.  #TogetherApart https://t.co/Qj71iuV0pi
Let’s end the spread of rumors about COVID-19 only share information from trusted sites and sources. https://t.co/7yEgev3h7d

I joined @RepRussFulcher @RepDelBene @cathymcmorris and @repblumenauer in reaching out for additional ventilators for our states as we are in dire need for more devices.  #Covid_19   https://t.co/y4uHjAwxWC

We are fortunate there are no confirmed cases of the novel coronavirus (COVID-19) in the state it is important we all remain calm yet vigilant. The web page below will be updated frequently to provide each of you with information as it becomes available. https://t.co/s1dU2IpWzP

FDA’s hotline (1-888-INFO-FDA) is available 24 hours a day for labs to call regarding difficulties obtaining supplies for collecting patient samples for COVID-19 testing including swabs media needed for transport and  conservation of the samples.
